title: Chinna Chinna Roja Poove Lyrics Poovizhi Vasalile Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Chinna Chinna Roja Poove
chella kannae nee yaaru
thappi vandha sirppi muthae
unna peththa thaai yaaru

sollikolla vaayumillai
allikolla thaayum illai
yaeno sodhanai
ila nenjinil vedhanai.

Chinna Chinna Roja Poove
chella kannae nee yaaru

chinna pinju nenjukullae
enna enna aasai undo
ullam thannai moodi vaiththa
dheivam vandhal sollum ingae

oorum illai perum illai
unmai solla yaarum illai
neeyum ini naanum
oru jeevan thaanadaa

solai kili polae
en tholil aadadaa
idhu pesaa oviyam
idhil sogam aayiram.

Chinna Chinna Roja Poove
chella kannae nee yaaru
thappi vandha sirppi muthae
unna peththa thaai yaaru

kannil unnai kaanum podhu
ennam engo poguthaiyaa
ennai pona pillai
ingae undhan kolam kondu
vandhadhendru ennugindren
vazhthu solli paaduginren

gangai nee endraal
karai ingu naanadaa
vaanam naan endraal
vidi velli neeyadaa

Chinna Chinna Roja Poove
chella kannae nee yaaru
thappi vandha sirppi muthae
unna peththa thaai yaaru

sollikolla vaayumillai
allikolla thaayum illai
yaeno sodhanai
ila nenjinil vedhanai.
